item.description:
A renewed interest in Christian mysticism is emerging in the Western
world, and it comes at a time when church attendance and membership are at
all time lows. What are people finding in mysticism that they are not
finding in the churches? Mysticism has never been about theological
concepts and rules for “good” behavior. It is not about how to earn
heaven or avoid hell. Mysticism always is about a soul’s profound and
heartrending relationship with God. Why are mystics’ relationships with
God always profound, and why does it break their hearts?

Join us to learn what Christian Mysticism is, how it is practiced, and how
you can begin moving toward a profound experience of the Love of God inside
your own being.

---------------------------------------------------------
About the presenter

Rev. Michael Knight is a Mystical Christian priest at the Center of Light in New Haven. He has been practicing mysticism and meditation in the Christian tradition for 7 years and teaching for 4 years. In his day job he works as a sales executive for a major internet software company. He is married and has two school-aged children.
